text:
Bonjour! Being American, I know very little French, but I'm learning! I'll be the english review on here. 

My wife and I visited here on our honeymoon. Being poor with the language we were nervous eating out for the first time, but our host, server, and the cooks were phenomenally helpful in helping us around the menu. We were well acquainted with the options and ordered the Poutine, Cesar Salad, and Beet Arrugula and Chevre Pate for our appetizers (entree). We also ordered the Flank Steak and French Fries as our main course. 

Let me put it simply first, then I'll get into something more descriptive. Simply put: This was the absolute best meal I've ever had in my life, and the wife agrees.

To be precise: Everything was prepared to perfection. The Poutine was a perfect blend of all elements the iconic dish of Quebec is known for. Fries, cheese curds, gravy, and pulled pork. You get crunchy, chewy, creamy, all those words that start with "C" and then some. Best Poutine I've ever had. The Cesar Salad was a unique take on what we were used to, being dominate brussel sprouts, with either the most fancy bacon I've had or a real delectable prosciutto fried to a crunchy and smoky bite. The Beets, Arrugula and Chevre Pate were unreal, the Chevre Pate and Poutine were fighting for the spotlight on our entree plate. It was all amazing. 

The Flank Steak was cooked perfectly, a nice warm pink center full of juicy umami flavor topped with a red wine reduction sauce that offered a sweet and savory compliment to the steak. The fries that came with the steak were cooked perfectly being nice and browned, came with a tangy aioli that I couldn't get enough of. Also, brussel sprouts came with the steak that were a nice clean pit stop between the other food. 

This was all so filling and amazing as it was, but to make our night even better the staff put together an amazing traditional Bread Pudding for dessert, congratulating my wife and my being freshly wedded. That is service at its best, and we greatly appreciate it. 

Truly an amazing restaurant, not a single bad thing to be said. If we weren't 600 miles from home we'd visit again!

Merci!

Le restaurant a une agréable ambiance . L'idée de pouvoir prendre 3 entrées pour repas est bonne et originale . La lecture du menu est inspirante , par contre le résultat est parfois moins heureux. Bon , mais pas exceptionnel . Je crois que le chef va trouver sa voie car c'est plein de potentiel et je souhaite un grand succès à ce Resto de quartier .

Ptit souper du samedi soir à La Belle et la Barbe, à notre arrivée nous sommes accueillis pas une hôtesse froide et dépourvue de sourire. Ça commence mal! Mais le menu nous fait oublier l'hôtesse! Beau choix de drinks. Les tartares excellents. Les portions sont généreuses, mon braisé de boeuf était très bon. Même propriétaire que La Carcasse à Candiac! J'aurais donné 4 étoiles mais l'hôtesse m'a vraiment déçu.

Tres beau bistro sur la rive-sud qui offre des plats variés et originaux! J'y suis allée avec mon copain et nous avons pris le plateau à partager en entrée qui suggère trois entrées pour le prix de deux! c'est une excellente façon de découvrir les plats de la place! 

Si vous aimez les plats originaux et abordables, je vous le suggère!
Services A1, carte des vins correcte et abordable. Bouffe est excellente et son prix est aussi très abordable.

Proposition très intéressante sur la Rive-Sud. On aime la formule trois entrées, qui suffit amplement en terme de quantité. Parmi les plats essayés il y a du très bon et du moyen. Le tartare de buf est exceptionnel, le ceviche est parfait. Mais les betterave et la poutine manquait une petite touche. On y retourne pour essayer les autres plats qui avait tous l'air bon. J'aurais aimé une petite sélection de bières de microbrasserie...

This place is a gem the food was spectacular the blends of comfort food and delicate blends of spices where perfectly executed. Thank you for a wonderful welcome to Canada  
But not open on January 1.
We had such a nice time! Boyh ordered the choose three appetizers and everything was delicious.  Friendly service and fun atmosphere,  will definitely return!
